stories.title: Set Up Multi-Channel Notifications in Your AWS Stack Using a Node.js Example

stories.text:
We’re hosting our Amplitude Investor Day on a livestream 10am-Noon PT today. I'm looking forward to taking questions in realtime! Thank you all for your support as we've scaled. I've directed my team to specifically take questions from all of you as well and not just institutional investors.

To view the livestream and submit questions, register here: https://amplitude.brand.live/c/investor-day Make sure to put who you are when you sign up and submit a question so we can get to you during the Q&A portions!
